law.text: Any limitation on the powers of a guardian contained in a will or other instrument which nominated a guardian should ordinarily be imposed by the court on the guardian. If the court limits any power conferred on the guardian by § 13-214 of this subtitle or § 15-102 of this article, the limitation shall be endorsed upon his letters of appointment.
